casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. George CONDOURAS, Relator-Appellant, v. Benjamin M. DAY, as Commissioner, etc., Respondent-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 9, 1928. No. 266. Leopold Klinger, of New York City, for appellant. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Frank Chambers, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
